column2: Besides, look at our country; God's gift of freedom is stamped upon it.
column3: Besides, look at our country; God's gift of freedom is stamped upon it.

column2: Then it is worthy its destination.	Then it is worthy its destination.
Thus time flew, till the sand-glass told her it was the eighth hour.
